entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 15.
